codelist.name: ActivityStatus
codelist.label: Activity Status
codelist.description: Lifecycle status of the activity from pipeline to completion

codelist.name: AidType
codelist.label: AidType
codelist.description: DAC/CRS classification of types of aid -
codelist.discussion: In DAC parlance, Type is the high level category e.g. A "Budget Support" whilst the lower level is Sub-type e.g. A01 "General Budget Support".

codelist.name: Country
codelist.label: Country
codelist.adherence: Names are in upper case whereas the ISO names are mixed case

version.description: SS South Sudan and AN Netherland Antilles added

codelist.label: Collaboration Type
codelist.description: DAC/CRS classification of bilateral and multilateral aid.
codelist.name: CollaborationType

codelist.label: Currency
codelist.description: Currency used for all transactions and budgets
codelist.name: Currency

codelist.label: Document Category
codelist.description: Categories of information included in published documents
codelist.name: DocumentCategory

version.description: Added 4 new options to the codelist: A10 - Tender, A11 - Contract, B04 - Aid Allocation Policy, B05 - Procurement Policy and Procedure

codelist.label: Finance Type
codelist.description: DAC/CRS transaction classification distinguishing between grants, loans, etc
codelist.name: FinanceType

codelist.label: Flow Type
codelist.description: DAC/CRS distinction between ODA (official development assistance) and other types of resource flow.
codelist.name: FlowType

codelist.label: Gazetteer Agency
codelist.description: An online resource that holds coordinates and descriptions of geographic locations
codelist.name: GazetteerAgency

codelist.label: Geographical Precision
codelist.description: A system for clarifying the accuracy and usage of geographical coordinates
codelist.name: GeographicalPrecision

codelist.label: Language
codelist.description: To specify the language of titles, descriptions and documents
codelist.name: Language

codelist.label: Organisation Identifier
codelist.name: OrganisationIdentifier
codelist.description: This list is composed of the three separate lists on the original IATI site

codelist.label: Sector Category
codelist.description: The categories of DAC Sector codes
codelist.name: SectorCategory

version.description: Added 3 new options to the codelist: QP - Purchase of Equity, QS - Sale of Equity ,CG - Credit Guarantee

codelist.label: Value Type
codelist.description: An enlarged version of TransactionType to include PD (planned Disbursements) and TB (Budget)
codelist.name: ValueType
